sentences.english: I love the Sagely City; this is my home.
sentences.chinese: 我愛聖城，這裏是我的家。

sentences.english: And we walked many days and many nights, yet we did not reach the Holy City.
sentences.chinese: 我們走了幾天幾夜，還沒有走到聖城。
萬佛聖城三週禪七時間表。

sentences.english: The city is topographically higher than the surrounding land.
sentences.chinese: 就地形學而言，聖城要比四周的土地都要高。

sentences.english: All the Levites in the holy city were two hundred fourscore and four.
sentences.chinese: 在聖城的利未人共二百八十四名。

sentences.english: We take a few days and nights have not yet reached the Holy City .
sentences.chinese: 我們走了幾天幾夜，還沒有走到聖城。

sentences.english: At the time, Vahidi was the head of the Iranian Revolutionary Guard's Quds Force.
sentences.chinese: 當時，瓦海德是伊朗革命衛隊“聖城旅”負責人。

sentences.english: Gold Sage Monastery will arrange bus tour for same-day travel.
sentences.chinese: 金聖寺將安排巴士前往聖城參加法會。

sentences.english: The Levites in the holy city totaled 284.
sentences.chinese: 在聖城的利未人共有二百八十四人。

sentences.english: All the Levites in the holy town were two hundred and eighty-four.
sentences.chinese: 在聖城的肋未人，共計二百八十四人。

sentences.english: What is the cost of staying at CTTB as a volunteer?
sentences.chinese: 萬佛聖城義工的住宿費用？

sentences.english: Besides, Jerusalem, in which the three monotheisms preserved their holy remains, was reckoned tob…
sentences.chinese: 三教在耶路撒冷都有聖蹟，都自稱是自己的聖城。

sentences.english: To the holy city of Byzantium .
Besides, Jerusalem, in which the three monotheisms preserved their holy remains, was reckone…
sentences.chinese: 三教在耶路撒冷都有聖蹟，都自稱是自己的聖城。

sentences.english: Like Zion, the Holy City, the capital of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 就像沙恩，那座聖城，天堂的首都。

sentences.english: Why are you interested in volunteering at the City of Ten Thousand Buddhas?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼您想在萬佛聖城當義工？

definition: sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
